nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures Game Book 7: The Ghostling Children

Star Wars Adventures Game Book 7: The Ghostling Children was the seventh installment of Scholastic's Star Wars Adventures series. This book is a reprint of Episode I Adventures Game Book 5: The Ghostling Children.
'Now flashback to the time before Episode I.'

The Ghostling children live on a beautiful, isolated world, safe from harm…until they are captured by an evil trader. Soon they find themselves on the harsh planet of Tatooine, about to be sold to the terrifying Gardulla the Hutt.
You are their only hope. You must break into Gardulla's fortress and free them.
